info.title: DataSync
info.description:
Use the DataSync API to synchronize your local data store with the data maintained by Realogy. Use the "active" method to do a one-time initialization of your data store and use the "Delta" method for each entity type for ongoing synchronization. Details on how to use each of these methods can be found in the method descriptions. Any vendor should be performing the data synchronization as mentioned below:
  1. One time initialization – this should be done only once while initializing data into your system using the API for the first time.
    1. Call the GetActiveListings method. This method will give all the active listings in the system. This method will give listingId and the lastupdateon for all the listings in the system.
    2. Now, call the GetListingById for each of the listings to get the details of the listings
  2. Ongoing synchronization –
    1. Call the Delta method for the listings (frequency can be 15 mins to 7 days but the recommended frequency is 30 mins to 2 hours)
    2. Please add a two minute overlap between subsequent delta calls so that listings updated during the edge time is not missed
    3. The Delta response will give the list of Listings that got changed along with the full details of the listing
  3. Periodic Reconciliation - This can be done weekly/biweekly/monthly to ensure that your system is in sync with ours
    1. Call the GetActiveListings method and for each listing, compare the lastupdateon date which you got in the Active Listings get with the one stored in your system (you should store the lastupdateon field from the Delta Response). Call the GetListingById method for those listings for which there is a difference in the lastupdateon time.

get.description: Use this method to retrieve Agent records that were added/updated (Upserted) or deleted since a specific time. The response will indicate if a particular Agent has been deleted or Upserted and timestamp at which that action occurred. If the Agent was Upserted, the response will include all of the available details for it. Results will be paginated, depending on the "page size" you specify and the amount of changes that have occurred. Note that the method will not accept a "since" time older than a week. The recommended synchronization frequency is every 1 - 4 hours. If your synchronization process is "broken" for over a week, use the "active" method to re-synchronize before resuming the regular synchronization process

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Format - date-time (as date-time in RFC3339). The time from which you need changes from. You should use the format emitted by Date's toJSON method (for example, 2017-04-23T18:25:43.511Z). If a timestamp older than a week is passed, a business rule violation will be thrown which will require the client to change the from date. As a best-practice, for a subsequent call to this method, send the timestamp when you started the previous delta call (instead of when you completed processing the response or the max of the lastUpdateOn timestamps of the returned records). This will ensure that you do not miss any changes that occurred while you are processing the response from this method

parameters.name: brandCode
parameters.description: The brand for which you need the delta for. If you specify a brand that you do not have access to, you will not get anything back in the response. Do not send this parameter if you need changes for any brand that you have access to

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: The ISO code of the country that the Agent's office is located in

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Format - int32. This is the maximum number of records that will be returned in one "page". A query may return fewer than the value of limit due to filtering. Do not depend on the number of results being fewer than the limit value to indicate your query reached the end of the list of data, use the absence of the "cursor" value instead (as described below). Default value is 100. Minimum is 10 and maximum is 1000. Recommended value is not more than 500.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: This is a value generated by this method to keep track of the data to include in subsequent calls (to return additional pages of results). This value will be automatically set in the "nextLink" URL returned by the method, so do not attempt to generate and send it yourself. If you generate this parameter value explicitly, you will very likely get a 400 response

400.description: Bad input parameter. Error message should indicate which one and why

get.description: Returns the list of Agents who are presently Active. This method can be used to do a first-time initialization of your local data store OR to perform periodic reconciliation of your data store with us. To get details of the Agent, use the GetAgentById method described below. If using this method for the first-time initialization, make sure to call the delta method by passing the timestamp when you started the initialization as the "since" parameter value. This will ensure that you get notified of any changes that happen in the time that it took to initialize your local data store

parameters.name: brandCode
parameters.description: The brand for which you need the data for. If you specify a brand that you do not have access to, you will not get anything back in the response. Do not send this parameter if you need changes for any brand that you have access to

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: The ISO code of the country that the Agent's office is located in

400.description: Bad input parameter. Error message should indicate which one and why

get.description: Use this method to retrieve details for a particular agent using the Realogy uniqueidentifier. The Realogy identifer is returned by the Delta or the Active methods. If you use IDs obtained from other sources, there is a possibility of getting 404 response

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The Realogy uniqueidentifier for the agent

404.description: Not Found. Record is no longer active in the system

id.description: Globally unique identifier assigned to a Company by Realogy

RFGID.description: Business identifier assigned to a Company by Realogy

brandCode.description: The brand that the Company is associated with

isNrt.description: This indicates whether it is Nrt Type or not

lastUpdateOn.description: The date/time that the Company record was last updated in the system (UTC)

canDoCommercialBusiness.description: Will be 'true' if this company can do commercial business

addlWebSites.description: A collection of websites associated with the Company

addlLanguageNames.description: A collection of Company names in other languages (non-English)

fullBath.description: Number of full baths in the property

halfBath.description: Number of half baths in the property

quarterBath.description: Number of quarter baths in the property

threeQuarterBath.description: Number of three quarter baths in the property

partialBath.description: Number of partial baths in the property

parkingPlaces.description: Number of parking places in the property

lotDimension.description: The dimensions of the Lot that the property is located in

levels.description: The number of levels (or storeys) in the Property

yearBuilt.description: The year in which the property was built

yearRenovated.description: The year in which the property was last renovated

totalRooms.description: Number of total rooms in the property

taxRollNumber.description: An identifier for a property within a given jurisdiction, such as a city or county, that can be taxed

zoning.description: Property in terms of permitted usage of land based on mapped zones by the authorities

providerName.description: The name of the provider of the listing information

providerCategory.description: The category of the provider of the listing information

providerURL.description: The URL of the provider of the listing information

providerKey.description: The unique identifier for the listing in the provider's system

leadEmail.description: The email address that leads for this Listing should be sent to

agriculturalPropertyNumber.description: A unique identifier given for the agriculture property

anchorStores.description: The stores within the shopping complex that draw traffic to the location

annualTax.description: The annualTax associated with the listing

availableFloors.description: The total number of floors available within a propertys Listing

availableSpace.description: The space available in the commercial property

averageFloorSize.description: The size of the floor in an average. A calculation of the total building area divided by the number of stories or levels within the building

averageOccupancyRate.description: The number of units in a building that have been rented out as compared to the total number of units in the building

bayDepth.description: The distance from the front to the back of the bay

buildingClass.description: The Subjective quality rating of buildings which indicates the competitive ability of each building to attract similar types of tenants

capRatePercent.description: The capitalization rate on the property in percentage

cashFlow.description: The amount of cash flow the property brings in if its on sale

ceilingHeight.description: The distance from the floor to the lowest hanging ceiling member or hanging objects of the industrial work area

clearance.description: The distance from the floor to the lowest hanging ceiling member or hanging objects, beams, joists or truss work descending down into a substantial portion of the industrial work area

columnSpacing.description: The distance between posts or vertical supporting beams in an industrial building

commonAreaFactor.description: The shared spaces on a single floor, and within a building in its entirety

dockHeight.description: The amount of distance the height of the slab at the bottom of an overhead door is from the ground level

downPayment.description: The down payment required by the current owner for a commercial listing

fullyLeasedIncome.description: The gross income that the owner currently receives if the property is fully leased

grossIncome.description: The gross income that the owner currently receives if the property is fully leased

hasRailAccess.description: Indicates whether the property has the industrial rail access to it

isAllowMapping.description: Indicates whether or not the property address should be displayed on a map

isCrossDocks.description: Indicates whether the property has the CrossDocks associated with it

isGroundLevel.description: The Industrial ground level of the property

isSprinkler.description: Indicates whether property has the industrial sprinkler to it

isSubLease.description: The value indicating whether the listing is a sublease

leaseTerm.description: Indicates the Measurement. List price or Lease rate or rental value at which the sub unit is available

leaseType.description: The type of lease for a listing

loanPayment.description: The current loan payment value on the property being paid by the owner

maxContiguousArea.description: The largest amount of open space available in a commercial building

maximumLeaseRate.description: The Maximum Lease Rate associated with the listing

minDivisibleArea.description: The minimum space which can be leased

minimumLeaseRate.description: The Minimum Lease Rate associated with the listing

netOperatingIncome.description: The potential rental income plus other income, less vacancy, credit losses, and operating expenses

numberOfDocks.description: The Number of Docks associated with the property

numberOfBallrooms.description: The number of ballrooms in a property

numberOfConferenceRooms.description: The number of conference rooms in a property

occupancyRate.description: The number of units in a building that have been rented out as compared to the total number of units in the building

parkingRatio.description: The ratio of available standard parking spaces to the gross leasable area of a property

power.description: The type and voltage of power applicable for the property

pricePerArea.description: The price per area of the property, this is generally the list price divided by the area

scheduleIncome.description: The gross income that would be collected from a rental property with all units 100% occupied and rented

suiteApartmentName.description: The Suite Apartment Name associated with the listing

taxIdNumber.description: The Tax Id Number associated with the listing

taxYear.description: The year in which tax was calculated

totalExpenses.description: The Total Expenses associated with the listing

totalUnits.description: The Total Units associated with the listing

turningRadius.description: The available turning radius available in the industrial property. Turning radius is the size of smallest possible circular turn a vehicle is able to take

linkedOffice.description: The Realogy office associated with the Non Realogy Listing. This field will be present only in case the caller is allowed to view the linked office

propertyFeatures.description: Collection of features for the property

openHouse.description: Collection of OpenHouses for the property

remarks.description: Collection of remarks for the property

webSites.description: Collection of websites for the property

schools.description: Collection of schools for the property

multiUnits.description: Collection of unit details of each unit for the property

propertyRooms.description: Collection of propertyRooms for the property

floors.description: Collection of floors for the property

suites.description: Collection of sub units/suites for the property

mlsInformation.description: Collection of MLS information for the property

taxInformation.description: Tax information associated with the Property

listingId.description: Globally unique identifier assigned to a listing by Realogy

isActive.description: Will be 'true' if this is an Active listing

isPending.description: Will be 'true' if this is presently Under Contract (Pending)

listingType.description: The type of Listings you are interested in. It can be ForSale, ForRent, ForSaleCommercial and ForLeaseCommercial.

listedOn.description: The date when the Listing became active

photoCount.description: Number of photos associated with listing

videoCount.description: Number of videos associated with listing

geographicRegions.description: A collection of geographic regions associated with the location of the property

mlsNumbers.description: A collection of MLS numbers associated with the Listing

RFGListingId.description: A short unique identifier assigned to the Listing by Realogy

isNewConstruction.description: Will be 'true' if the Property is a new construction

listingURL.description: Public URL where the listing can be accessed

development.description: The name of the Development that the property is located in

rentalFrequency.description: The frequency at which the Rental amount is to be paid

isCallToShow.description: Will be 'true' if a prospective buyer or agent has to contact the Seller to schedule an appoinment to view the Property

isForAuction.description: Will be 'true' if this property is being sold by Auction

isHideListPrice.description: Will be 'true' if the list price is not supposed to be shown on consumer site

isByAppointmentOnly.description: Will be 'true' if a prospective buyer or agent has to contact the Seller to schedule an appoinment to view the Property

propertyUse.description: Property Use information of the property

totalBath.description: Number of partial baths in the property

noOfBedrooms.description: Number of bedrooms in the property

defaultPhotoURL.description: URL to the default photo for the property

isForeClosure.description: Indicates if the property is for foreclosure

isShortSale.description: Indicates if the property is for short sale

lastUpdateOn.description: Timestamp when the listing was last updated at Realogy system

lastSoldOn.description: Timestamp on which the property is previously sold

agents.description: The agent(s) associated with the Listing

team.description: The team associated with the Listing

isShowAddressOnInternet.description: Will be 'true' if  the property address shall be displayed on Internet

leadEmailAddress.description: Email address to send any leads generated for the Office

defaultPhotoURL.description: URL for the default photo associated with the Office

brokerName.description: Name of the Broker of the Office

addlPhoneNumbers.description: Array of additional phone numbers associated with the office

entityPreference.description: Array of  entityPreference associated with the office

RFGCompanyId.description: Unique identifier assigned to a company by Realogy

RFGOfficeId.description: Unique identifier assigned to an office by Realogy

seasonalOpenMMDD.description: If a Seasonal Office, the month/day on which the Office opens in a year

seasonalCloseMMDD.description: If a Seasonal Office, the month/day on which the Office closes in a year

recruitingEmailAddress.description: Email address to send any recruiting-related communications for the Office

lastUpdateOn.description: The date/time that the Office record was last updated in the system (UTC)

areaServed.description: Collection of areas served by the office

addlLanguageNames.description: A collection of office names in other languages (non-English)

serviceRegion.description: Service Region associated with the Office.

remarks.description: Collection of remarks for the Office

specialMarkets.description: A list of Markets that the Office specializes in

addlWebSites.description: A collection of websites associated with the Office

languagesSpoken.description: A collection of languages spoken by Agents that work out of the office

geographicRegions.description: A collection of geographic regions associated with the Office location

mlsInformation.description: A collection of MLS numbers associated with an Office

officeId.description: Globally unique identifier assigned to an office by Realogy

companyId.description: Globally unique identifier assigned to a company by Realogy

brandCode.description: The Franchise that the Office is part of

serviceRegion.description: Service Region associated with the office.

phoneNumber.description: Main contact phone number for the office

emailAddress.description: Main contact email address for the office

id.description: Globally unique identifier assigned to an Agent by Realogy

isAgent.description: Indicates whether the person is an agent or not

defaultPhotoURL.description: Profile photo URL for the Agent

leadEmailAddress.description: Email address to send leads to the agent

specialPrograms.description: Special programs asssociated with the agent

RFGStaffId.description: A short unique identifier assigned to the CompanyStaff by Realogy

id.description: Globally unique identifier assigned to an Agent by Realogy

defaultPhotoURL.description: Profile photo URL for the Agent

leadEmailAddress.description: Email address to send leads to the agent

isRepresentative.description: Indicates whether the person is a Representative or not.

RFGStaffId.description: A short unique identifier assigned to the CompanyStaff by Realogy

id.description: Globally unique identifier assigned to an Agent by Realogy

defaultPhotoURL.description: Profile photo URL for the Agent

leadEmailAddress.description: Email address to send leads to the agent

isPrimary.description: Indicates whether the agent is primary agent or not

RFGStaffId.description: A short unique identifier assigned to the CompanyStaff by Realogy

personId.description: Unique identifier assigned to a Person. This field is not to be used as this will be deprecated soon.

lastUpdateOn.description: The date/time that the Agent record was last updated in the system (UTC)

areasOfSpecialization.description: Area of specialization for the agent

specialPrograms.description: The special program associated with the agent.

remarks.description: A collection of Profile descriptions associated with the Agent

webSites.description: A collection of websites associated with the Agent

licenseInfo.description: A collection of licenses associated with the Agent

mlsInformation.description: MLS numbers associated with the Agent

isTeamMember.description: Indicates whether the person is a team member or not.

teamId.description: Globally unique identifier assigned to a Team by Realogy

RFGTeamID.description: A short unique identifier assigned to the Team by Realogy

lastUpdateOn.description: The date/time in UTC when the team was last updated

members.description: Agents who are part of the Team

addlLanguageNames.description: Additional languages spoken by the team

addlWebSites.description: A collection of websites associated with the Team

district.description: Subdivision name in the country or region for the address. In USA it's same as County.

type.description: Type of the area served (PostalCode, etc.)

items.description: Name of the area served. It can be a list of PostalCodes, Cities, or some other localities

year.description: The year in which the Award was received

type.description: The type of Geographic Region (Neighborhood, StateRegion, CountryRegion, etc.)

prefix.description: Any prefix (area code) associated with the Phone Number

suffix.description: Any suffix (extension) associated with the Phone Number

contentLanguageCode.description: The content language code for the website

mediaId.description: A globally unique identifier for the Media assigned by Realogy

sequenceNumber.description: The display sequence number for the Media

isDefault.description: Indicates whether the media is the default media or not

htmlDescription.description: Short description of the media with HTML markup

format.description: The format of the media (Image, URL, etc.)

lastUpdateOn.description: The date/time in UTC when the media was last updated

MediaArray.description: Collection of media for the property

number.description: The unique identifier assigned to the entity by the MLS system

mlsId.description: The MLS's unique identifier. This is not the MLS number for the entity

mlsName.description: The name of the MLS system that assigned the identifier

isPrimary.description: Indicates whether the mls number is primary or not

languageCode.description: The ISO code of the language the name is in
The ISO code of the language the name is in

currencyCode.description: The ISO code of the currency the price is in

isPriceUponRequest.description: Denotes whether the asking price known only upon request or not

languageCode.description: The ISO code of the language the name is in

role.description: The role description of the agent

isFullTime.description: Will be 'true' if the role is fulltime

isProducingRole.description: Will be 'true' if the role is a producing role

startOn.description: The date/time that the Open House starts at

endOn.description: The date/time that the Open House ends

isByAppointment.description: A 'true' indicates that the Open House is by appointment only

isShowOnInternet.description: Denotes whether to show Listing on Internet

remarks.description: Any remarks associated with the Open House

groupName.description: The group that the feature belongs in

type.description: The type of Fee associated with the property

frequency.description: The frequency the fee is paid at. For example, Monthly, Annually, Bi-Monthly, etc.

sequenceNumber.description: Display sequence mumber for the Room

level.description: The level of the property that the Room is in

type.description: Type of the school (Elementary, Middle, etc.)

distanceFromSchool.description: The distance the school is at from the Property

district.description: The 'district' that the school belongs to

bedRoom.description: Number of Bedrooms in a unit located in the property.

threeQuarterBath.description: The threeQuarterBath details of the unit.

quarterBath.description: The quarterBath details of the unit.

fullBath.description: The fullBath details of the unit.

halfBath.description: The halfBath details of the unit.

year.description: The year for which the tax amount is applicable

description.description: Any description associated with the Tax

countryCode.description: The ISO code of the country the license was issued in

stateCode.description: The code of the State/Province the license was issued in

issuedOn.description: The date on which the license was issued

trace_id.description: Unique id associated with the error. Use this trace id when you contact support for any error.

error_codes.description: List of error codes. You can use these to understand the reason of failure better. User these values when you contact support for any error

bayDepth.description: The Bay Depth for the SubUnit

columnSpacing.description: The distance between posts or vertical supporting beams in an industrial building

currencyCode.description: The Currency Code for the SubUnit

fullBath.description: The number of full baths in the property

halfBath.description: The number of half baths in the property

isVacant.description: Indicates True if sub unit Vacant

leaseTerm.description: The Lease Term for the sub unit

noOfBedRooms.description: The Number of bedrooms for the sub unit

suiteName.description: The suite name of the property

rate.description: The List price or Lease rate or rental value at which the sub unit is available

floorName.description: The name of the floor on the property. For example top floor, mezzanine floor etc

unitOfMeasure.description: The Unit description of measurement of the floor
